title: Are online certification courses in Data Science worth doing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Data Scientist has become such a glorified job title, that nowadays some have started calling themselves data scientists, based on the work they do and not because of the data science degree they have, while others acquire the job title by procuring a particular data science degree and some through data science online course certifications. Data Scientist Certifications do provide all the essential skills for becoming a data scientist and the quality of data science online courses from Digital Vidya, Coursera, Udacity and Udemy is very high. Courses are designed keeping in mind the need for data science skillset and offer a comprehensive Data Science Online Course in Python and R, which is created by experts who are currently working in the industry as Data Scientists who are currently working with top IT companies. The certificates help beginners and also advanced students to gain an in-depth understanding of basic concepts of data science i.e. statistics, machine learning, and algorithmic implementations in popular data science programming languages- Python and R. You also get to know about the real-world problems a data scientist encounters regularly – anomalies, missing data, corrupt data, etc. and how to solve them. Many certifications also provide a One-on-one mentoring session with the best data scientists in the industry that help students easily understand the entire data science process. A data science degree or a MOOC cannot get you a job as a data scientist, it is ultimately the skills that matter. Having a data science degree is not a bad thing but without experience and internship, cracking the interview for a data scientist job, at top tech companies is difficult. However, not having a data science degree helps candidates prove that they are more than willing to become a data scientist- by having a data science online course certification with many hands-on projects and a GitHub account validating your practical data science skills. Hands-on project experience shows employers that a candidate can actually do things on the job. It is not necessary to have a data science degree or a post-graduate degree. All it requires is enough baseline knowledge with the ability to adapt and learn. Resources for Data Science Courses: Digital Vidya offers a Certified Data Science course with Python which is completely online.Data Science: Online Courses from Harvard, MIT, Microsoft | edXData Science Online Courses & Programs | UdacityData Science Courses | Data Science Certification – upGradI hope this helps. Good luck.

Learning through online Certification programs, provide you with the added advantage of flexiblity and convinence of time. Nowadays, many of us are working individuals who wants to pursue certain Certification in order to achieve more in the field of work and also to earn more. So, if you’re thinking of doing any Data Science Certification online you should definetly give it a heads-up! Nowadays, there are numerous online institutes which provide Big Data Certification programs, like Coursera, Edureka, Simpli Learn, Data Science Council of America, SAS etc. Below are few programs which these Institutes provide online:- SAS - SAS understands that every organization, in every industry, has its own unique challenges when it comes to getting the most value from data. One of the leaders in Statistical Analysis System provides 150-products solely dedicated to analytics, programming, etc. Check out there programs Products & Software A-Z Data Science Council of America - Getting credentialised by DASCA is beneficial because it provides growth in your Big Data Career and lands you the finest jobs. DASCA tests individuals along the world's most robust generic Big Data knowledge framework – the EKF™ to validate their knowledge in 30 profession–critical dimensions, before awarding its certification. And that's how a ABDA™, ABDE™, SBDA™, SBDE™, SDS™, and PDS™can lend the sharpest competitive edge to your employability and growth. Depending upon your qualifications and work experience Data Science Council provides the Certifcation Programs,viz, Associate Big Data Engineer - This certification is for young graduating university and tech–school students around the world, readying themselves for exciting Big Data careers.Senior Big Data Engineer - The SBDE™ certification for experienced software engineers and professionals who are either already in the Big Data groove or may be aspiring to enter the space.Associate Big Data Analyst - ABDA certification is for young business–school students and those graduating with majors like Statistics, Applied Mathematics, and Economics, dreaming of making exciting careers in Big Data.Senior Big Data Analyst - ABDA certification are for professionals wanting to pace up their growth in Big Data analytics. You can trust the internationally accepted and recognized SBDA™Senior Data Scientist - The SDS™ by the Data Science Council of America (DASCA) adds speed to your journey of becoming a Big Data Scientist. This certification’s for accomplished Big Data analytics professionals looking for scientist roles.Principal Data Analyst - PDS™ is one big snob of a qualification to hanker for, if you're a gray head with 12+ years or more of accomplished experience in leading Big Data revolutions in large, complex environments, with Graduate/ Master's degrees in Business/ Technology/ Mathematics or allied disciplines to boot.Coursera - They have various segments of certification courses from Data Science, SQL to Big Data. They provides universal access to the world’s best education, partnering with top universities and organizations to offer courses online. Each course is like an interactive textbook, featuring pre-recorded videos, quizzes, and projects. There best courses are :- Master of Computer Science in Data Science (MCS-DS) - The MCS-DS builds expertise in four core areas of computer science: data visualization, machine learning, data mining and cloud computing.Executive Data Science Specialization - This includes four intensive courses, you can learn what you need to know to begin assembling and leading a data science enterprise, even if you have never worked in data science before.Simpli Learn - This organisation also offers some up to date certifications related to Data Analytics and Big Data. Their Courses included: Data Science with SAS TrainingData Science Certification Training - R ProgrammingBig Data Hadoop and Spark DeveloperYou can visit Online Certification Training Courses for Professionals | Simplilearn to learn more in depth about their certifications Hope this will help you decide which course to opt for. Cheers!

It depends on a lot of things. Let me talk about a few: Your Goals For Learning: Why do you want to learn Data Science? If it to start a career in the field? Or is it to add an additional skill to your professional profile? I suggest you think about your reasons for studying it first. The Institute/Platform You Choose: There are a lot of institutes offering Data Science courses these days. If you select one that has a comprehensive practice-based curriculum then it will be more helpful to you. The Effort You Put In: We all live busy lives. In the midst of the busy schedule, how much time and effort can you put for learning something as advanced as Data Science? I suggest the following institute for Data Science:  I would also like to discuss the things I suggest you check if you do plan to learn Data Science Online from an institute: Syllabus: Check if they cover the topics in-depth or just touch upon the basics. Topics like Data Processing, Data Analysis, Visualization, Statistical Methods, Machine Learning related concepts, Numpy, Pandas, etc. should be checked out by you. Faculty: Go for a course where the faculty is highly qualified and experienced. If the teachers have worked in Data Science, then they will be able to explain better. Real World Projects: Projects are very valuable in Data Science. The more you work on them, the better your skills and knowledge become. It helps your portfolio also. Interviewers prefer people with project experience.

Yes, Online Certification courses in Data Science is worth doing, because due to the current situation, people have to stay at home and study, due to this the demand of Online certification courses has been increased, and it will also help you to clear all your doubts, take live session recording anytime and you can revise the course as well while watching the recording. It saves your time for travelling as well as for learning also. So this the reason Online Certification courses in Data science worth. There are many Online Certification courses where you can learn Data Science Course: Business ToysUpgradSimplilearnExcelrGreat Learning

Any certification is not worth if you are a fresher! What needed is hands on experience. Plus Data Science is worth doing if you have brilliant mind and can outshine most of the crowd. So, better do something which can give you a decent job than running after the glamour.

NO! Its not mandatory.Don’t get trapped in the marketing stunts of the institutes.You can learn/understand the necessary concepts without the need of any institute, on your own. I have completed an M.Sc in Statistics?Saurabh Gupta's answer to How hard is it for a mechanical engineer to learn big data (Hadoop)? Good Luck!
